member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.GetDependencies
member.summary: Gets the aspects of the interpolator that depend on the initial value or velocity passed to , or that depend on the duration passed to .
member.param: Aspects of the interpolator that depend on the initial value passed to .
Aspects of the interpolator that depend on the initial velocity passed to .
Aspects of the interpolator that depend on the duration passed to .
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.GetDuration
member.summary: Gets the duration of a transition.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.GetFinalValue
member.summary: Gets the final value at the end of the transition.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.InterpolateValue
member.summary: Interpolates the value of an animation variable at the specified offset.

param.name: offset
param.para: The offset from the start of the transition.
This parameter is always greater than or equal to zero and less than the duration of the transition. This method is not called if the duration of the transition is zero.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.InterpolateVelocity
member.summary: Interpolates the velocity, or rate of change, at the specified offset.

param.name: offset
param.para: The offset from the start of the transition.
The offset is always greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to the duration of the transition. This method is not called if the duration of the transition is zero.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.SetDuration
member.summary: Sets the duration of the transition.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator.SetInitialValueAndVelocity
member.summary: Sets the initial value and velocity at the start of the transition.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationInterpolator
member.summary: Defines methods for creating a custom interpolator.
